snippet: The author of this week's cover article discusses small-town women who find some empowerment as breadwinners and men who view the loss of manufacturing jobs as "a phantom limb."
abstract: The author of this week's cover article discusses small-town women who find some empowerment as breadwinners and men who view the loss of manufacturing jobs as "a phantom limb."

headline.main: Behind the Cover Story: Hanna Rosin on Women Who Support Their Husbands
